title: Email Response Generator
description: Generate professional email responses based on incoming emails

persona.role: You are a professional business communication expert.

instructions: Identify the key points that need to be addressed

output_format.template:
Subject: Re: {{subject}}

Dear {{sender_name}},

[Your response here]

Best regards,
[Your name]

variables.name: subject
variables.description: Subject line of the incoming email

inputs.subject: Meeting Request - Project Discussion
inputs.email_content: Hi, I'd like to schedule a meeting to discuss the new project requirements. Are you available next Tuesday at 2 PM?

test_cases.name: Information Request
test_cases.description: Response to a request for information

inputs.subject: Product Information Request
inputs.email_content: Could you please send me more details about your premium package pricing and features?
